attributes.comment:
I need to express my concern regarding the proposed increase in fees specifically
for any related to adoption. My family is built by adoption and we know first hand
how financially straining it is. With potentially hundreds of dollars added on to the
already very high costs it makes future adoptions more difficult, and could really
discourage families that are already pressed to come up with all the adoption
fees. The government was kind enough to recognize the expense of adoption and
to grant the adoption tax credit, please do not counter act this by adding more
fees.

Thank you,
Cheryl Bissaillon

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Cheryl M. Bissaillon
